pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation using Hierarchical Bayesian under Zero Inflated Binomial Distribution // Provides function for area level of small area estimation using hierarchical Bayesian (HB) method with Zero-Inflated Binomial distribution for variables of interest. Some dataset produced by a data generation are also provided. The 'rjags' package is employed to obtain parameter estimates. Model-based estimators involves the HB estimators which include the mean and the variation of mean.
